did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: College of Architecture, Art, and Planning financial records, 1948-[1978?]

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Financial records include lists of expenditures, Dean of Architecture's accounts, vouchers, receipts, requisitions, and rough drafts.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Financial records include lists of expenditures for equipment, temporary help, building improvements, library books and periodicals, teaching materials, department expenses, visiting lecturers, administration by department or account, Dean of Architecture's accounts, vouchers, receipts, requisitions, and rough drafts.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning. Financial Records, #15-1-1514. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
